description: This version of the  Man in Tuxedo emoji has the  Medium Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Moderate Brown Skin Tone on supporte
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the man in a tuxedo emoji presents a distinguished figure with a rich, medium skin tone and impeccably rendered formalwear. The jacket boasts Apple's signature glossy 3D shading, with sharp lapels and a crisp white shirt that catches the light beautifully.  Its smooth gradients and realistic lighting create a sense of sophistication, making it perfect for conveying celebration, elegance, or a special occasion in digital correspondence.
